definition: to do/to grow/to write or compose/to pretend/to regard as/to feel/writings or works
article/commodity/product/goods/kind/grade/rank/character/disposition/nature/temperament/variety/to taste sth/to sample/to criticize/to comment/to judge/to size up/fret (on a guitar or lute)

sentences.english: Never far from her work, the mistress of the web patiently waits.
sentences.chinese: 蛛網的女主人永遠守在自己的作品邊，耐心的等候。

sentences.english: Thus, we can see some installation works made by graduates from the sculpture department.
sentences.chinese: 所以在雕塑系畢業生的作品中也能看到部分裝置作品。

sentences.english: Thus, we can see some installation works made by graduates from the sculpture department.
sentences.chinese: 所以在雕塑系畢業生的作品中也能看到部分裝置作品。

sentences.english: I told you that in the dedication of my last work.
sentences.chinese: 在我上一部作品的獻辭中，我就這樣告訴過你。

sentences.english: or read to him some of my own writings and been rewarded in return with praise unsparing.
sentences.chinese: 或者給他讀些我寫的作品，都得到了他極大的讚賞。

sentences.english: His work partakes of the aesthetic fashions of his time.
sentences.chinese: 他的作品具有當時的某些審美時尚。

sentences.english: Sets of works published by the Metropolitan Express.
sentences.chinese: 多套作品被都市快報刊登。

sentences.english: The third section is on the values of Chen Peixun's Piano Music works.
sentences.chinese: 第三節，陳培勳鋼琴音樂作品的價值體現。

sentences.english: On this point, Liu Liguo's work expresses a kind of fatalism.
sentences.chinese: 就這一點說，劉力國的作品最終表達的是一種宿命。

sentences.english: Ru handed down less than one hundred works, so very precious.
sentences.chinese: 汝窯傳世作品不足百件，因此非常珍貴。

sentences.english: At first glance, it seems like the sort of story that falls in with the rest of the modern genre.
sentences.chinese: 初看來，這部書似乎與當代流派的其他作品類似。

sentences.english: Deng Tuzi Fond of beauty is one of Song Yu's early works.
sentences.chinese: 《登徒子好色賦》是宋玉早期的作品。

sentences.english: He can run off many classics from memory.
sentences.chinese: 他能把許多古典作品倒背如流。

sentences.english: BE careful in reading G. B. Shaw. He often had his tongue in his cheek.
sentences.chinese: 讀肖伯納的作品時得注意，他的文章經常話裏有話。

sentences.english: "Non-instructive" teaching can firstly be used in literature teaching.
sentences.chinese: “非指示性”教育首先用於文學作品的閱讀欣賞教學。

sentences.english: The panel of judges looked through more than 43, 000 entries to this year's competition.
sentences.chinese: 今年評委小組審閱了43000多幅參賽作品。

definition: to create/to produce/to write/creative work/creation/CL:個|个[ge4]
representative work (of an author or artist)
